name: Maize Farming Guide
info: Best grown in AEZ LH1-LH3. Requires 500-700mm rainfall. Ideal pH: 5.5-7.0. Yield: 20-40 bags/acre with proper management.

name: Drip Irrigation Kit
info: Water-efficient system for arid areas. Covers 1/4 acre. Includes filters, tubing, and emitters. Reduces water use by 40%.

name: Compost Preparation
info: Layer green (nitrogen) and brown (carbon) materials. Turn every 2 weeks. Ready in 2-3 months. Improves soil structure.
